Texto: 
elevated serum calcium and 24hour urine sample
pending surgery
hypoechoic oval mass in the posterior aspect of the left thyroid lobe.
parathyroid adenoma
lymph node, septated thyroid gland, strap muscle.
this is a 40 y/o asymtomatic male incidental finding of hypercalcemia on routine laboratory analysis.
